## BaseSeo variable

This is the BaseSeo component which also takes in the default seo props.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
BaseSeo: ({ defer, metaTags, linkTags, ...props }: AllSeoProps) => JSX.Element
```

## Remarks

It should be used for setting default props and is used internally as the base for the `GatsbySeo` component.

```tsx
import { BaseSeo } from 'gatsby-plugin-next-seo';

const Page = () => {
  return (
    <>
      <BaseSeo title='Fun times' defaultOpenGraphImageWidth={100} />
      <h1>Look at me!</h1>
    </>
  );
};

```
